actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Paulette Mendes-Silva.

summary.text: Admits liability of the United States for damages resulting from the administration to a named individual of a yellow fever inoculation. Confers jurisdiction upon the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia, notwithstanding certain time limitations, to hear, determine, and render judgment on the amount of damages to be awarded to such individual.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Paulette Mendes-Silva.
